tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (NN Nothing)) (PP (IN like) (NP (DT the) (NNS holidays)))) (: ...) (NP (NP (ADJP (RB even) (RBR more)) (NNS opportunities)) (SBAR (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB fight) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ your) (NN family)))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Nothing/NN nmod:like>[holidays/NNS case>like/IN det>the/DT] punct>.../: dep>[opportunities/NNS amod>[more/RBR advmod>even/RB] acl>[fight/VB mark>to/TO nmod:with>[family/NN case>with/IN nmod:poss>your/PRP$]]] punct>./.]
